data.name: See the simul host's point of view
data.description: Tired of scrolling around to see which game the simul host is looking at? The current game is placed right atop the other games. Also semi-responsive (adapts to the size of the screen, sort of)! The only side effect I've noticed is that completed simuls have a large blank space where the current game board is supposed to go. I'm not sure if I can fix that.

data.name: Etherscan.io Dark (Source Viewer) fix Solar-mode
data.description:
This is the Etherscan Dark (Source Viewer) fix Solarized-mode Edition for Etherscan.io Steps on how to use User styles - 1. Visit 'Stylus' Brave/Chrome extension https://greasyfork.org/en/help/installing-user-styles 2. Click on 'Install as user style' button 3. Stylus will then handle user styles according to preferences
Etherscan is a Block Explorer and Analytics Platform for Ethereum, a decentralized smart contracts platform.

data.name: Tronscan.org Dark (Shadow) Dank-mode
data.description:
This is the Tronscan Dark (Shadow) Dank-mode Edition for Tronscan.org Steps on how to use User styles - 1. Visit 'Stylus' Brave/Chrome extension https://greasyfork.org/en/help/installing-user-styles 2. Click on 'Install as user style' button 3. Stylus will then handle user styles according to preferences
Tronscan is the first block explorer based on TRON. It not only includes some basic functions of the block explorer, such as search query transactions, accounts, blocks, nodes, smart contracts; data statistics and queries on the chain, but also directly supports token creation. Tronscan also has a built-in web wallet and Bancor-based DEX, which enriches the Tronscan application matrix. — Tron Foundation
Brought to you by curvy.one
